definition: handling any occasion smoothly (idiom); equal to any situation
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Thailand could be adaptable in its dealing with distant empires .
sentences.chinese: 泰國與遠方的帝國打交道時可以應付裕如。
